about_the_game:
DONT GET IT YET IT SUCKS RIGHT NOW (i mean still get the game but like just know its really fucking bad like just wait for the massive update its coming soon-ish idk)

Harmoni is an open Source 4 Key Rhythm Game Made In Lua/Love2D!
Press DFJK (keybind settings not currently added) to press the notes.

Comes with 1 song included. (that goofy bee song cuz royalty free lmfao)

Uses Quaver's song format so you can import your own songs from Quaver, just right click the song in Quaver, press export, and then unzip the file (you may have to rename it to .zip), and then drag and drop the folder into Harmoni's Music folder. (press F2 in the Song Select menu to open the Music folder.)

To download more songs (just whatever random songs i have in quaver tbh lmao) press F1 in the song select menu to visit my song pack Google Drive, I just put songs I have from rhythm games there to play in Harmoni

(currently the instructions.txt file included with the Base Song Pack is outdated, to install the Song Pack, download it, open it, and extract everything from inside the music.zip file to Harmoni’s Music folder)
detailed_description:
DONT GET IT YET IT SUCKS RIGHT NOW (i mean still get the game but like just know its really fucking bad like just wait for the massive update its coming soon-ish idk)

Harmoni is an open Source 4 Key Rhythm Game Made In Lua/Love2D!
Press DFJK (keybind settings not currently added) to press the notes.

Comes with 1 song included. (that goofy bee song cuz royalty free lmfao)

Uses Quaver's song format so you can import your own songs from Quaver, just right click the song in Quaver, press export, and then unzip the file (you may have to rename it to .zip), and then drag and drop the folder into Harmoni's Music folder. (press F2 in the Song Select menu to open the Music folder.)

To download more songs (just whatever random songs i have in quaver tbh lmao) press F1 in the song select menu to visit my song pack Google Drive, I just put songs I have from rhythm games there to play in Harmoni

(currently the instructions.txt file included with the Base Song Pack is outdated, to install the Song Pack, download it, open it, and extract everything from inside the music.zip file to Harmoni’s Music folder)
